basic.description: This course introduces the student to the design, creation and management of standards-based, ADA-compliant web sites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Other topics include acquiring domain names and Web hosting agencies. The principles of user accessibility and user-centered design are emphasized, as is a focus on the implementation of modern web standards and coding, including search engine optimization.
basic.subject: LIS
basic.title: Design and Production of Networked Multimedia
